item.title: j8085sim
item.description:
I just published my BTech miniproject - 8085sim, an 8085 simulator - on Sourceforge. Download it from here - http://sourceforge.net/projects/j8085sim/

To get a valid name I added a ‘j’ (short for Java) before the name, so it is now ‘j8085sim’.

This project is the result of about 5 weeks work by me and my team mates - Jinsmon Kurian and Deepu Devassy. Since the project demo is over, I believe this software should now be released. So here it is now. Enjoy!

p.s : As with any student project this also might have some glitches, but still I believe its a stable version.
